text:
Message 306 of 4024
I have replied on the original. I would like to go back to Phase I guidelines. On both sides. If either is in violation we make a decision. Can we agree
rather than going to the lawyers? I am agreeing to follow guidelines as well. Let’s don’t escalate. Thanks!
Sent:01/08/2024 at 01:01 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/08/2024 at 01:05 PM)
Subject:Re: Urgent and Emergency Contact
Message 307 of 4024
I will unblock. To be used sparingly, primarily for emergencies. The next time it becomes emotional, harassing, unsafe, threatening I will block and
we will let lawyers figure it out. I will not compromise on this.
No early am or late texts similar to OFW timelines.
Sent:01/08/2024 at 01:07 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/08/2024 at 01:07 PM)
Subject:Re: Urgent and Emergency Contact
Message 308 of 4024
That sounds like a perfectly rational plan for us to
move forward. Let’s do it!
Sent:01/08/2024 at 01:17 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/08/2024 at 03:10 PM)
Subject:Re: Urgent and Emergency Contact
Message 309 of 4024
So I am being FAR more ambitious with the plan today than originally intended. I’m trying to take almost everything I can that has a container.
The net is it’s more expensive but your cool with that, but also may take longer. So want you to be aware it may be later for AD pick up. That said, it
will be a marathon game so we will likely end at the same time.
Sent:01/08/2024 at 01:58 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/08/2024 at 03:10 PM)
Subject:Re: This Week
Message 310 of 4024
Adrian is aligned to watch with you tonight. Can you confirm pick up and drop off time please and share new address. Thank you
Sent:01/08/2024 at 04:22 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/08/2024 at 04:33 PM)
Subject:Re: This Week
